translation.en: [narrator] Meet Terry Seattle, Homicide Division.
translation.es: Él es Terry Seattle, de la brigada de homicidios.

translation.en: For Terry, every day, means a new murder case,
translation.es: Cada día, Terry debe lidiar con un nuevo caso de asesinato

translation.en: and a new celebrity guest star as his partner.
translation.es: y una estrella invitada como su asistente.

translation.en: Today's guest: comedy legend Conan O'Brien.
translation.es: El invitado de hoy es el ícono de la comedia Conan O'Brien.

translation.en: But here's the catch.
Conan isn't being given a script.
translation.es: Conan no cuenta con el guion.

translation.en: He has no idea what's about to happen.
translation.es: No tiene ni idea de lo que va a suceder.

translation.en: Together, he and Terry will have to improvise their way through the case.
translation.es: Juntos, él y Terry tendrán que recurrir a la improvisación para resolver el caso.

translation.en: But it'll be up to Conan alone to name the killer.
translation.es: Pero solo corresponderá a Conan identificar al asesino.

translation.en: So join them as they punch a one-way ticket
translation.es: Los invitamos a acompañarlos en su viaje de ida

translation.en: to Murderville.
[male deep voice] The big city.
Where only the strong survive…
And the ruthless… thrive.
I just made that rhyme up.
No big deal. I can do all sorts of cool stuff.
translation.es: Nada del otro mundo. Hago muchas cosas geniales.

translation.en: My name is Terry Seattle.
I'm a senior homicide detective. And I am killing it.
translation.es: Soy un detective de homicidios con experiencia, y soy mortal.

translation.en: Morning, Chief.
Pleasure to see you.
Pleasure to see you. I hope you're doing very well.
translation.es: Igualmente. Espero que estés muy bien.

translation.en: I am doing very well. Thank you.
translation.es: La verdad es que estoy muy bien, gracias.

translation.en: You need to come past the house and pick up the rest of your crap.
translation.es: Tienes que venir a casa y llevarte tus porquerías.

translation.en: That is not crap, Rhonda, that's 17 years of marriage.
translation.es: No son porquerías, Rhonda, son 17 años de matrimonio.

translation.en: It's a broken PlayStation 2, some old Maxim magazines,
translation.es: Es una PlayStation Dos rota, unas revistas Maxim de hace mil años,

translation.en: a car wash receipt signed by Axl Rose
translation.es: un recibo del lavadero firmado por Axl Rose

translation.en: and a "Take me drunk I'm home" t-shirt.
translation.es: y tu camiseta "Llévame a ebrio estoy casa".

translation.en: If you had read just one of those Maxim articles,
translation.es: Si hubieses leído uno de esos artículos de Maxim,

translation.en: you would know that as a modern male--
Terry, come get your shit or I'm throwing it out.
translation.es: Terry, ven por tus porquerías o las tiro.

translation.en: Okay?
Okay.
Don't pout, Detective. I've got a present for you.
translation.es: No hagas pucheros. Tengo un regalo para ti.

translation.en: A new partner.
No, you can't be serious. Come on, my life's not going wrong enough as it is
translation.es: ¿Bromeas? Por favor, ¿no tengo bastante ya en la vida

translation.en: that I gotta babysit some homicide trainee?
translation.es: como para cuidar a un detective en formación?

translation.en: Do you not remember what happened when I babysat your nephew?
translation.es: ¿Olvidas lo que pasó cuando me encargaste a tu sobrino?

translation.en: Come on out, Conan.
[Rhonda] Come a little closer.
I never liked to presume how close I can get.
translation.es: Prefiero no jactarme de mis habilidades.

translation.en: [Rhonda] That's just fine.
Terry, meet your new partner, Conan O'Brien.
translation.es: Terry, te presento a tu nuevo compañero, Conan O'Brien.

translation.en: Conan, this is senior detective, Terry Seattle.
translation.es: Conan, él es el detective mayor Terry Seattle.

translation.en: Good to see you, sir. How are you?
Got quite a grip on you, huh?
-[Conan] Yeah. -Good Lord.
-[Terry] Yes. [chuckles] -[Conan] Yeah, okay. Yeah.
Put your fingers in your ears.
translation.es: Ponte los dedos en las orejas.

translation.en: Are you joking?
I mean, did I just turn seven years old? Because you hired a goddamn clown!
translation.es: ¿Qué tengo, siete años? Contrataste a un maldito payaso.

translation.en: You're the only detective who can't keep a partner.
translation.es: Eres el único que no conserva a su compañero.

translation.en: Yeah, because they're all idiots!
I mean, look at this guy with his fingers in his ears. I mean, God!
translation.es: Es decir, míralo con los dedos en las orejas. ¡Por Dios!

translation.en: I can actually,
the fingers don't actually block out the sound that well,
translation.es: los dedos no aíslan tan bien el sonido,

translation.en: so I heard clown, I heard idiot.
Terry, make it work.
Nice to meet you.
Let me tell you something.
This ginger monstrosity is the biggest mistake in the history of city homicide!
translation.es: Este mamarracho es lo peor que le puede pasar a la brigada de homicidios.

translation.en: No offense.
None taken.
You seem very nervous.
It's my first day on the job and you're a bit of a legend, so.
translation.es: Es mi primer día y tú eres toda una leyenda, así que…

translation.en: It's Terry Seattle. Is that it?
You do more bowing than a goddamn Tommy Tune.
Okay, bit of an outdated reference if you ask me, but--
translation.es: Bueno, es una referencia un poco antigua, creo yo, pero…

translation.en: Follow me.
-It's a great office you have here. -[chuckles]
Talker.
Yeah. Okay.
Senior detective, Terry Seattle. And no, I've never been.
translation.es: Detective mayor Terry Seattle. Y no, no he estado allí.

translation.en: That was gonna be my first question.
-Of course it was. -Yeah.
I got married in Seattle.
What?
I got married in Seattle.
No, I mean, you got married?
Yeah.
To what?
To a wonderful woman.
Does she know?
She has an idea. Let's just put it that way.
translation.es: Digamos que tiene una vaga idea.

translation.en: Listen,
I hope you don't take this personal,
translation.es: espero que no lo tomes a mal,

translation.en: but I'm not really looking for a new partner. I already had the best.
translation.es: pero en realidad no estoy buscando un compañero. Tenía a la mejor.

translation.en: Her name was Lori Griffin. And she was murdered 15 years ago.
translation.es: Se llamaba Lori Griffin. La asesinaron hace 15 años.

translation.en: And out of respect for Lori Griffin,
translation.es: Y por respeto hacia Lori Griffin,

translation.en: her desk has remained completely untouched.
translation.es: su escritorio se conserva tal y como estaba

translation.en: Since that night.
Everything is the same, just the way she left it. Her case notes,
translation.es: Todo está como ella lo dejó. Sus notas del caso,

translation.en: her uneaten breakfast burrito,
translation.es: el burrito que no se comió,

translation.en: her pet rabbit, Gulliver. God, I miss that little guy.
translation.es: su conejo Gulliver. Dios, cómo extraño a ese pequeñín.

translation.en: You know, you can feed those things even after the owner's gone.
translation.es: Hay que alimentar a los bichos aunque su dueño haya muerto.

translation.en: It would not be respectful to touch it.
translation.es: Sería una falta de respeto tocarlo.

translation.en: Just feed and water them, a rabbit can live--
translation.es: Con agua y comida, un conejo puede vivir…

translation.en: Disrespectful.
40 years.
Disrespectful.
What'd you do prior to this,
translation.es: ¿A qué te dedicabas antes de convertirte

translation.en: before you decided to become a homicide detective? What kind of work were you in?
translation.es: en detective de homicidios? ¿Qué tipo de trabajo hacías?

translation.en: Been a lot of things. An entertainer for a while. I, uh--
translation.es: He hecho muchas cosas. Fui animador durante un tiempo y…

translation.en: Yeah. Well, listen, none of that matters now. Nobody cares.
translation.es: Nada de eso importa ahora. A nadie le interesa.

translation.en: -Well, you just asked. -No, but none of it matters.
translation.es: - Usted preguntó. - Sí, pero no importa.

translation.en: City homicide isn't for precious little man-boys
translation.es: La brigada de homicidios no es para niñitos consentidos

translation.en: who are afraid to get their lips dirty and their pants wet. Okay?
translation.es: que temen mancharse la boca y ensuciarse los pantalones, ¿sí?

translation.en: No, I wouldn't think so.
'Cause you don't know anything about getting your lips dirty, do you?
translation.es: Tú nunca te has manchado la boca, ¿cierto?

translation.en: You probably keep your lips real clean.
translation.es: Seguro que la conservas bien limpia.

translation.en: I can get these lips as dirty as you want them to be.
translation.es: La puedo manchar tanto como Ud. quiera,

translation.en: Just covered in all kinds of stuff.
City homicide, we're bad dudes.
translation.es: Los de Homicidios somos tipos malos.

translation.en: I'm a bad dude. Are you a bad dude?
translation.es: Yo soy un tipo malo, ¿y tú?

translation.en: Listen,
you are a bad mofo. Everyone knows it.
translation.es: eres un cabrón malo, todos lo saben.

translation.en: And I want to get in there. I want to get my hands dirty, my lips dirty.
translation.es: Y yo quiero ensuciarme las manos, la boca.

translation.en: I want to solve whatever case comes our way.
translation.es: Quiero resolver cualquier caso que se nos presente.

translation.en: He's got the goods.
He's got what it takes to be a hard-ass, homicide detective trainee.
translation.es: Este hombre tiene lo necesario para ser un detective de homicidios en formación.

translation.en: Well, that's good news. Because there's been a murder.
translation.es: Es una buena noticia, porque ha habido un asesinato.

translation.en: What?
A magician performing at the grand opening of the city library
translation.es: Un mago que participaba en la inauguración de la biblioteca municipal

translation.en: sawed his assistant in half
translation.es: cortó a su asistente por la mitad

translation.en: but couldn't put her back together again.
translation.es: y no pudo volver a pegarla.

translation.en: [grunts] Classic Humpty Dumpty.
I need you two down there on the double.
translation.es: Necesito que vayan los dos ahora mismo.

translation.en: Goodbye, Chief.
You ready to go solve this murder?
I am. I'm ready to go.
-Yeah, let's get going. -All right.
[Terry] We took my '82 Dodge Rampage over to the library to check out the crime scene.
translation.es: Fuimos a la biblioteca en mi Dodge del 82 para examinar la escena del crimen.

translation.en: It was time for Conan to take off his training diaper
translation.es: Conan debía quitarse su pañal de entrenamiento

translation.en: and start pooping his pants like a big boy.
translation.es: y hacerse caca en los pantalones como un niño grande.

translation.en: Terry Seattle, Senior Detec-- Doesn't matter.
translation.es: Terry Seattle, detective mayor. No te preocupes,

translation.en: You don't need to show-- we're in a crime scene, okay?
translation.es: no tienes que mostrar… Estamos en una escena del crimen, ¿sí?

translation.en: I think we should find out what the hell went on here.
translation.es: Creo que deberíamos averiguar qué diablos pasó aquí.

translation.en: -Officers. -Officers.
I already said officers.
Okay.
Well, well, look at this guy.
translation.es: Vaya, vaya… Mira a este tipo.

translation.en: You must be Terry's new partner.
Yes. I'm his new partner, Conan O'Brien. What's your name?
translation.es: Sí, soy su nuevo compañero, Conan O'Brien. ¿Y tú?

translation.en: Detective Darren Phillips. Most people call me Daz.
translation.es: Detective Darren Phillips, pero me dicen Daz.

translation.en: Nobody call-- I don't call you Daz at all.
[Daz] It's a pleasure.
Detective Phillips, honor to see you. What's going on?
translation.es: Detective Phillips, un placer. ¿Qué tenemos aquí?

translation.en: All right, stop schmoozing with this guy. What's wrong? You're just embarrassing.
translation.es: Déjate de charlar con él. ¿Qué te pasa? No seas ridículo.

translation.en: Just tell him it's our crime scene and get the hell out of here.
translation.es: Dile que nos encargamos nosotros y ya está.

translation.en: Hey, this is our crime scene. We're taking lead on this one.
translation.es: Estamos a cargo de esta escena del crimen.

translation.en: We understand there's been a homicide murder.
translation.es: Al parecer, hubo un asesinato homicida.

translation.en: Uh, victim sawed in half during some kind of magical performance, if you will.
translation.es: Cortaron a la víctima por la mitad durante un acto de magia, por así decir.

translation.en: Why are you telling him? He's an officer.
translation.es: ¿Por qué se lo dices a él? Es policía.

translation.en: I'm reviewing the facts of what I've heard so far.
translation.es: Estoy repasando los hechos que conozco hasta ahora.

translation.en: Let's continue. Sir, please. How can we help?
translation.es: Sigamos adelante. Díganos, ¿en qué podemos ayudar?

translation.en: What do we got here?
This gentleman is Captivating Keith.
It was his assistant who got sawed in half.
translation.es: Fue a su asistente a quien cortaron por la mitad.

translation.en: I don't know what happened, man.
My assistant, Sarah and me, we just--
translation.es: Mi asistente Sarah y yo estábamos

translation.en: we did the same routine we've always done.
translation.es: haciendo el mismo número que hacemos siempre.

translation.en: Somebody must have gone in and they must have
replaced the trick saw with a real saw.
translation.es: y reemplazó la sierra de mentira por una de verdad.

translation.en: The blood. There, there, blood. It's just everywhere! Blood!
translation.es: La sangre. Sangre ahí y ahí. Está por todas partes. ¡Sangre!

translation.en: Did you think at any point when there was all that blood
translation.es: ¿En algún momento pensó, al ver toda esa sangre,

translation.en: that maybe you should stop sawing? Did that occur to you?
translation.es: que tal vez debía dejar de serruchar? ¿Se le ocurrió?

translation.en: Maybe.
Did you have a safe word that you normally employ?
-Of course we had a safe word. -Okay.
If anything was to go wrong, my assistant was supposed to shout, "Stop!"
translation.es: Si algo salía mal, mi asistente debía gritar: "¡Alto!".

translation.en: But all I heard was, "Keith, you're sawing me in half."
translation.es: Pero lo único que oí fue: "Keith, me estás cortando".

translation.en: -I guess it's not the safe word. -No, they're not the same.
translation.es: - Y no era la palabra de seguridad. - No, no es lo mismo.

translation.en: -Yeah, well… Really isn't. -There's rules.
translation.es: - Sí, bueno, es verdad. - Hay reglas.

translation.en: We're sorry for your loss. Thank you.
[Terry] Amber.
This is Amber Kang. Forensics.
translation.es: Ella es Amber King, del equipo forense.

translation.en: Nice to see you.
Homicide detective, Kang Coroner… Uh…
-What…? -What? I'm sorry.
What are you doing? You're embarrassing, you're so nerv--
translation.es: ¿Qué estás haciendo? Me estás dejando en ridículo…

translation.en: I got nervous.
Amber, um…
we'd like to know what's happening here. State of the body… dead, I presume.
translation.es: quisiéramos saber qué pasa aquí. Estado del cuerpo… muerto, supongo.

translation.en: Very dead.
What've we got here, Amber?
Let me take you over to the murder weapon.
Now, here's something interesting. No fingerprints.
translation.es: Lo interesante es que no hay huellas dactilares.

translation.en: But, you'll never guess what I did find on the handle.
translation.es: Pero a que no adivinan lo que encontré en el mango.

translation.en: Traces of hot sauce.
-Hot sauce on the handle. -Spicy.
translation.es: - Salsa picante en el mango. - ¡Qué picante!

translation.en: [chuckles] The body is right there.
And you're being a total clown.
translation.es: y tú te comportas como un payaso.

translation.en: Now, just take it easy.
Uh… traces of hot sauce. Were you able to trace what kind of hot sauce?
translation.es: Rastros de salsa picante. ¿Sabemos qué tipo de salsa picante?

translation.en: Not yet, but we also found trace amounts of pet hair.
translation.es: Todavía no, pero también hallamos rastros de pelo de mascota.

translation.en: Most likely a small animal.
Interesting.
What are you thinking? Maybe a beagle out for revenge?
translation.es: ¿Qué crees? ¿Un beagle con sed de venganza?

translation.en: Anything else, Amber?
Well, did you take a look at the suitcase?
Says this is where Captivating Keith kept his trick saw.
translation.es: Aquí es donde Keith el Encantador guardaba su sierra.

translation.en: Now apparently, he was the only one with a key
translation.es: Al parecer, solo él tenía una llave,

translation.en: so someone must have picked the lock, switched the saws.
translation.es: así que alguien debe haber forzado la cerradura y cambiado las sierras.

translation.en: [girl] Excuse me, Mr. Policeman.
Yes?
When is the magician going to finish the trick?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo es que el mago va a terminar el truco?

translation.en: Well,
I'm gonna look at some evidence
translation.es: yo voy a examinar algunas pruebas

translation.en: and this tall, young gentleman here
translation.es: y este señor alto y joven

translation.en: will be happy to answer any of your questions.
translation.es: con gusto responderá a todas tus preguntas.

translation.en: [Terry] So…
Hello, what's your name?
When is the magician going to put the lady back together?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo es que el mago va a volver a juntar a la señora?

translation.en: Well,
the lady can't go back together
translation.es: la señora no se puede volver a juntar

translation.en: because what happened,
is the magician
really sawed her in half,
translation.es: realmente la cortó por la mitad.

translation.en: cut through skin,
ligament, muscle, bone.
She had instantaneous, probably 90% blood loss
translation.es: Perdió de manera inmediata alrededor de un 90 % de sangre

translation.en: and then she went into that black void
translation.es: y luego cayó en ese agujero negro

translation.en: known as death.
Where there is no return.
translation.es: Y de allí no se regresa.

translation.en: She's gone. Gone forever.
translation.es: Se fue. Se fue para siempre.

translation.en: What does that all even mean? I don't--
She's dead.
-I just don't understand-- -She's so dead.
I just don't understand. Is magic real or not?
translation.es: No entiendo. ¿La magia existe o no?

translation.en: It's a very simple question, sir. It's a yes or no!
It's not magic.
It is magic.
-God. -Look at the sign behind you.
Yeah, I know. That's what grown-ups call a lie.
translation.es: Sí, lo sé. Es lo que los adultos llaman una mentira.

translation.en: Is this what dying is?
That's what I told you. Yes, this is what dying is like.
translation.es: Te lo acabo de decir. Sí, así es morir.

translation.en: She'll go to heaven, right?
Oh, well, I don't know.
Will she still be in two pieces when she's in heaven?
translation.es: ¿Estará partida en dos cuando suba al cielo?

translation.en: Well, no, my guess is, before they put her in the ground--
translation.es: No creo. Supongo que antes de enterrarla, la van a…

translation.en: All right, trainee, let's go. We found some new evidence.
[grunts] Was on my knee for a long time.
[Terry] Our first suspect was Captivating Keith's former assistant, Deb.
translation.es: Nuestra primera sospechosa era Deb, la exasistente de Keith.

translation.en: She'd recently been fired and replaced
translation.es: La habían despedido y reemplazado por una chica mucho más joven y más muerta: Sarah.

translation.en: with the much younger and now much deader, Sarah.
translation.es: y reemplazado por una chica mucho más joven y más muerta: Sarah.

translation.en: Welcome to Quirky Jack's Homestyle Eatery.
translation.es: Bienvenidos a la estrafalaria cafetería de Jack,

translation.en: Where we serve heaping portions of whimsy and medium-sized portions of food.
translation.es: donde servimos grandes dosis de rareza y porciones medianas de comida.

translation.en: My name is Deb, I'll be your server.
Can I start you off with a bowl of our world-famous deep-fried chowder?
translation.es: ¿Les gustaría empezar con un tazón de nuestra famosa crema frita de mariscos?

translation.en: We're not really hungry for food, Deb.
We are hungry for answers.
Is this about what happened to Sarah at Keith's magic show?
translation.es: ¿Es por lo que le pasó a Sarah en el show de Keith?

translation.en: That's right. It is about what happened to Sarah.
translation.es: Exacto, es por lo que le pasó a Sarah.

translation.en: Okay. Listen, I'll talk to you, but you're gonna have to order something
translation.es: Hablaré con ustedes, pero tendrán que ordenar algo.

translation.en: because otherwise my boss is gonna get mad.
translation.es: Si no, mi jefe se va a enojar.

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, well, I could eat something.
Sure, yeah. I'll have…
translation.es: Sí, claro. Yo voy a pedir…

translation.en: Oh, you know what, they got the sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
They're back. Yeah, we'll take two of those. The sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.es: Volvieron. Sí, vamos a querer dos jugosopeños.

translation.en: Do you want to add two sloparitas for five bucks more?
translation.es: ¿Agregan dos jugosaritas por cinco dólares más?

translation.en: -[Conan] Let's do it. -Two, dos, sloparitas.
-Yes. -I'll be back with your food.
translation.es: - Sí. - Ya les traigo su comida.

translation.en: You're gonna love this sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.es: Te va a encantar el jugosopeño.

translation.en: You have never had a wetter sandwich. It's unbelievable.
translation.es: Es el mejor sándwich del mundo. Increíble.

translation.en: All right. Well, I'm looking forward to it.
It's like eating throw up. That's delicious.
translation.es: Es como comer vómito. Es delicioso.

translation.en: All right, we got two sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.es: Bien, por aquí tenemos dos sándwiches jugosopeños.

translation.en: Yes, we sure do.
And two sloparitas.
Two sloparitas.
This is good. And you gotta try some of this signature spicy slop sauce.
translation.es: Muy rico. Y te recomiendo probarlo con un poco de salsa picante jugosa.

translation.en: [Terry] You know, it just makes it extra sloppy.
[Deb] That is extremely hot…
Yeah. That's good. You have never had a sloppier sandwich.
translation.es: Así está bien. Nunca probaste un sándwich así de jugoso.

translation.en: -Get right into it, huh? -[Terry] Yup. Eat up.
Yeah, I got other tables, so…
Well, I don't have other murders. So.
translation.es: Pero yo no tengo otros asesinatos, de modo que…

translation.en: -God, it's wet. -Okay.
Yeah, okay.
[Terry] That is a sloppy sandwich.
-[Deb] I tried to warn you. -Yeah.
[Terry] All right, you got some questions in your notebook.
[Deb] Yeah, did you have questions for me?
Go ahead. Shoot. This is your time to shine.
translation.es: Dispara. Es tu momento de brillar.

translation.en: -Jesus Christ. -[Terry] Hey, we haven't got all day.
translation.es: - Dios. - Vamos, no tenemos todo el día.

translation.en: Okay, I'm sorry.
Wanna take another bite first? Are you hungry?
Let me get that sloppy for you. You've never had a sloppy sandwich.
translation.es: Echémosle más salsa. Es tu primer sándwich jugoso.

translation.en: -Well, this is great. -Just slop it. Really slop it.
translation.es: - Así está bien. - Tiene que chorrear.

translation.en: No, it's great. It's very aggressive on your part.
translation.es: Muy bien, muy agresivo de tu parte.

translation.en: [Terry] Go ahead.
[Terry] Dive in there, Conan.
Is it true Captivating Keith
replaced you with Sarah 'cause he thought you'd gotten too old?
translation.es: te reemplazó por Sarah porque creía que estabas demasiado vieja?

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Conan. What the hell's wrong with you?
translation.es: Por Dios, Conan. ¿Qué demonios pasa contigo?

translation.en: I spent the best years of my life
translation.es: Pasé los mejores años de mi vida

translation.en: getting shoved into boxes and like, attacked
translation.es: embutiéndome en cajas y dejándome atacar por palomas

translation.en: by doves or very mean animals.
For what? So I can be replaced
by some 19-year-old with fake boobs
translation.es: por una tipa de 19 años con tetas de mentira

translation.en: who doesn't even know how to pick a closed-shackle padlock.
translation.es: que ni siquiera sabe forzar una cerradura.

translation.en: [Deb] It's humiliating!
Get in there! You're not--
I don't know what you're talking about! I'm eating everything!
translation.es: Pero ¿de qué hablas? ¡Me estoy comiendo todo!

translation.en: [Deb] He's right. You're not slopping the Joe.
I wanna die.
Another question for you.
Is it safe to say you held a grudge against Sarah?
translation.es: ¿Podría decirse que le guardabas rencor a Sarah?

translation.en: Duh! Wouldn't you?
Probably.
What's wrong with your face?
I have high blood pressure.
Is there anyone else who might have wanted to hurt her?
She used to be another magician's assistant. Magic Melvin.
translation.es: Antes era la asistente de otro mago, Melvin el Mágico.

translation.en: Magic Melvin?
Yeah. I heard they separated on bad terms, so you could talk to him.
translation.es: Sí. Oí que se separaron en malos términos. Podrían hablar con él.

translation.en: [Terry] You okay?
Maybe you need to get in that sloppy--
No, I can't. I honestly, I have had so much of that right now.
translation.es: No, no puedo. La verdad es que ya comí lo suficiente.

translation.en: -Everything's gonna be okay. -[Deb] It's not gonna be okay!
translation.es: - Todo va a estar bien. - ¡No va a estar todo bien!

translation.en: Dude, look at my life!
No one wants to hire a 40-year-old magician's assistant!
translation.es: ¡Nadie quiere contratar a una asistente de mago de 40 años!

translation.en: Oh, please.
I work in this crappy job.
My clothes smell like steam meat. My stupid boyfriend tried to cheer me up
translation.es: Mi ropa huele a carne hervida. El idiota de mi novio trató de animarme

translation.en: by buying me a puppy, but I have allergies.
translation.es: comprándome un cachorrito, pero soy alérgica.

translation.en: So, I had to tell him, "You can't keep that dog in my house."
translation.es: Así que tuve que decirle: "No puedo tener a ese perro en mi casa".

translation.en: And then he said, "I can't talk right now, Deb. I'm with my wife and kids."
translation.es: Y él me contestó: "Ahora no puedo. Estoy con mi esposa e hijos.

translation.en: "And you know we have boundaries."
So, now I have no choice but to go over to his house
translation.es: De modo que ahora no tengo más remedio que ir a su casa

translation.en: and make a scene in front of his entire family.
translation.es: y hacer una escena frente a toda su familia.

translation.en: I'll take this when you're ready.
[Terry] Thanks to Deb's tip,
we brought Captivating Keith's rival, Magic Melvin, in for questioning.
translation.es: citamos al rival de Keith, Melvin el Mágico, para interrogarlo.

translation.en: It was time for Conan and me to take the gloves off.
translation.es: Era hora de que Conan y yo nos ensuciáramos las manos.

translation.en: We got a suspect. We got this guy Melvin coming in.
translation.es: Tenemos un sospechoso. El tal Melvin va a venir.

translation.en: -We're gonna break this guy. -Okay.
translation.es: - Vamos a quebrar a este tipo. - Bien.

translation.en: We're gonna break his will.
Want to do good cop bad cop? Or should we just both be bad cop?
translation.es: ¿Policía bueno y policía malo? ¿O somos los dos malos?

translation.en: I think two bad-- I think bad cop, bad cop.
-[Conan] Bad cop, worse cop. -[Terry] Yeah.
Here we go.
Can I get you anything? Coffee, anything you need?
translation.es: ¿Le ofrezco algo? ¿Café u otra cosa que desee?

translation.en: Actually, yup, you know what, I'll have a breakfast burrito.
translation.es: Quisiera pedir un burrito para desayunar.

translation.en: Uh, three eggs,
soft scrambled, onions and peppers,
Tabasco, salt, and pepper.
And you know what my favorite trick is?
Making that little thing disappear every morning.
Okay, no food for a murder suspect.
translation.es: Oye, nada de comida para un sospechoso de homicidio.

translation.en: Do you guys want anything?
Get out of here, Hughes. You're the worst.
Now, you listen to me, Melvin. Grab a seat, O'Brien.
translation.es: Escúchame bien, Melvin. Toma asiento, O'Brien.

translation.en: God, that started off so cool.
I know, I couldn't--
You flipped it and then you couldn't land it.
translation.es: La giraste y no pudiste bajarla.

translation.en: No, I just-- I didn't think about it ahead of time.
translation.es: No, es que no lo tenía previsto.

translation.en: [Terry] So, magic Melvin.
Can you see me through the mirror?
Oh, hi. I talk to my wife like this when she's doing her makeup.
translation.es: ¿Qué tal? Así es como le hablo a mi esposa cuando se maquilla.

translation.en: -You got a lot of jokes, Melvin. -Yeah, you got a lot of jokes.
Well, you know, as a magician I do have patter and I do like to have fun.
translation.es: Como mago que soy, tengo cháchara y me gusta divertirme.

translation.en: Tell my partner a joke.
Alright, so these two Jews walk into a--
translation.es: Bueno, entran dos judíos en un…

translation.en: -Jews, okay, no. We're not cool with that. -Okay, alright, we're not gonna do that.
[Terry] Do something else.
Alright. So, four or five Jews--
translation.es: Bueno, entran cuatro o cinco judíos…

translation.en: -No, no, no. -You know what? No.
[Terry] No, listen up, Melvin.
Do you know what happened to your former assistant, Sarah, today?
translation.es: ¿Sabes lo que le pasó a tu exasistente Sarah?

translation.en: Yes, it's terrible. It's a magician's worst nightmare.
translation.es: Sí. Es la peor pesadilla de un mago.

translation.en: Unbelievable acting.
You don't seem that busted up about it and I wonder why?
translation.es: No te veo muy compungido, me pregunto por qué.

translation.en: 'Cause maybe you had something to do with it!
Detective, what are you accusing me of?
A young woman was murdered against her will today
translation.es: Esta mañana, una mujer fue asesinada en contra de su voluntad,

translation.en: and if I find out that you had anything to do with it,
translation.es: y si me entero de que tuviste algo que ver en ello,

translation.en: I swear to God, I will peel off your skin,
translation.es: juro por Dios que te arrancaré el pellejo,

translation.en: eat it and then shit it out
and use that excrement
as fertilizer to grow a tree from which I will one day hang you from.
translation.es: como fertilizante para el árbol del que algún día te colgaré.

translation.en: You're gonna die and we're going to watch you,
unless you tell us exactly, exactly what happened!
translation.es: a menos que nos digas exactamente lo que pasó.

translation.en: -What happened? -What happened?
Detectives, I am as law-abiding as they come.
translation.es: Detectives, no hay nadie más respetuoso de la ley que yo.

translation.en: I can give you an example.
Whenever I find something that's not mine, I always return it.
translation.es: Cada vez que encuentro algo que no es mío, lo devuelvo.

translation.en: Such as this quarter I just found
translation.es: Como esta moneda que acabo de encontrar…

translation.en: -What the--? -behind your ear!
And wait! Oh, oh, my goodness. Look at this, another one!
translation.es: Un momento… Ay, caramba. Qué curioso, encontré otra.

translation.en: Can you see that?
Yeah, he's got it in his hand before…
translation.es: Sí, la tenía en la mano…

translation.en: That's incredible!
Quarters are very easy to lose behind your ears
translation.es: Las monedas se pierden detrás de las orejas

translation.en: -because they're small. -[Terry] 'cause they're small.
But if I mix it up just a little bit. You can hear it and I--
translation.es: Pero si las mezclo un poquito, escuchen lo que pasa…

translation.en: blow it, look at this.
And now it's a single half-dollar fifty-cent piece. [laughs]
translation.es: Y ahora tenemos una sola moneda de 50 centavos.

translation.en: Make sure to put that in your piggy bank.
-That is astounding. -It's not.
Holy shit.
He's always got one in the other hand.
translation.es: Tiene una en la otra mano.

translation.en: My jaw is on the floor.
Oh, well, then maybe we should clean it up.
-Actually, that was pretty cool. -Let me just clean up the jaw.
translation.es: - Eso sí que estuvo bueno. - Limpiemos esa baba.

translation.en: -[Conan] I like that one. -We don't need this thing anymore.
So all we do a little pixie dust. Rub it on here and--
translation.es: así que echamos unos cuantos polvitos mágicos por aquí y por allá…

translation.en: -[Conan] I didn't see-- Okay, that was… -[Terry] No way!
-That was insane. That was… -[Melvin] That's what I'm talking about.
translation.es: - En serio, qué locura. - No lo puedo creer.

translation.en: -That was a solid B+ up-close trick. -I got to be honest with you--
translation.es: - Ese fue un truco bastante bueno. - A decir verdad,

translation.en: I feel good, I feel like I'm good with this suspect. There's nothing.
translation.es: este sospechoso me cae bien, yo diría que es inocente.

translation.en: No, I have questions.
Can you tell us what happened between you and your old assistant?
translation.es: ¿Podría decirnos qué pasó entre usted y su exasistente?

translation.en: Was there a falling out?
-I can tell you the whole story. -[Terry] Okay.
But first I just need some help from you.
translation.es: Pero antes voy a necesitar que me ayuden.

translation.en: -Okay. -If you don't mind.
Anything ever.
So, what I'd like you to do is, here's a deck of cards.
translation.es: Verán, aquí tengo una baraja de naipes…

translation.en: Don't they frisk people before they bring them into this interrogation room?
translation.es: ¿No registran a la gente antes de entrar?

translation.en: -Now. -[Terry] Okay.
-I'll spread these out and I want you-- -Looks like a regular deck of cards.
translation.es: - Las extiendo… - Parece una baraja normal.

translation.en: Please, detective, to take any card you want.
translation.es: Por favor, detective, tome el naipe que prefiera.

translation.en: Any one, any card. Don't let me influence you.
translation.es: Cualquier naipe, da igual. No se deje influenciar por mí.

translation.en: Just choose one. Is that the one you want? Do you want to change your mind?
-Okay. I do want to change my mind. -Very good.
I'm gonna take this one here.
We can be here all day. Thank you.
translation.es: Podemos estar aquí todo el día.

translation.en: I'd love to be here-- I mean, I could watch this all day.
translation.es: Yo me pasaría el día entero viendo esto.

translation.en: You've taken the card. Show it to your partner, please. Do not show it to me.
translation.es: Muestre el naipe a su compañero, que no lo vea yo.

translation.en: I'm looking away, I'm looking down. Alright.
translation.es: Yo no miro. Miraré hacia el costado. Muy bien.

translation.en: And now I'd like you to put it back anywhere you like in the deck.
translation.es: Ahora voy a pedirle que lo devuelva a la baraja.

translation.en: I'm going to watch this hands this whole time. I'm gonna get this.
translation.es: Le miraré las manos todo el tiempo. Quiero ver cómo lo hace.

translation.en: Eye on him.
And now, we're going to mix them up real good. And I will tell you
translation.es: Mientras mezclamos los naipes, les diré

translation.en: that Sarah was my assistant for a few months
translation.es: que Sarah fue mi asistente durante algunos meses

translation.en: and everything was going great.
She'd been doing a terrific job and then one day,
translation.es: Hacía un excelente trabajo, hasta que un día

translation.en: she just didn't show up for work,
and I thought it was strange. And then the next week,
translation.es: Me pareció extraño. A la semana siguiente,

translation.en: I saw that she was working for Captivating Keith
translation.es: me enteré de que trabajaba para Keith el Encantador

translation.en: and he was performing all my tricks!
translation.es: y qué el hacía todos mis trucos.

translation.en: -She stole your tricks. -She stole your act.
translation.es: - Se los robó. - Sarah te robó los trucos.

translation.en: -That's motive, right there. -That is motive, that is.
translation.es: - Eso es un móvil. - Sí, es un móvil.

translation.en: Aha, but I will tell you it's been a blessing
translation.es: Así es, pero permítanme decirles que ha sido una bendición,

translation.en: because it took me out of my comfort zone
translation.es: porque me sacó de mi zona de confort

translation.en: and it forced me to take my act to the next level.
translation.es: y me obligó a mejorar mi espectáculo de magia.

translation.en: So I'm very thankful for this.
-Can I ask the two of you a question? -Yeah, ask away.
Sir, would you please lift up this tape recorder
that's been sitting here the entire time in full view
translation.es: que estuvo aquí de principio a fin a la vista de todos?

translation.en: and you'll see that there is in fact a single playing card.
translation.es: Verá que debajo se encuentra un naipe.

translation.en: Would you, for the very first time,
tell us what card you picked out of the deck?
translation.es: qué naipe había sacado del mazo?

translation.en: It was the Queen of Spades.
Queen of Spades. And now, if you will just check
translation.es: La reina de picas. Si es usted tan amable,

translation.en: the card right there and tell us all, show us all
translation.es: dé vuelta este naipe, muéstrelo y díganos

translation.en: that it is, in fact, the Queen of Spades.
translation.es: si, efectivamente, se trata de la reina de picas.

translation.en: Are you kidding?
Ladies and gentlemen.
That is sorcery!
That's incredible!
No one gets that excited about the cards.
translation.es: Nadie se entusiasma tanto con los naipes.

translation.en: Are you--
Maybe if you're that scared, you should cuff me up.
translation.es: Si tanto miedo les da, deberían esposarme.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah! Let me get in on this.
translation.es: ¡Sí, sí! Yo me encargo de esto.

translation.en: Let's see, okay, let's see. No way.
translation.es: Vamos a ver… Muy bien, están cerradas.

translation.en: You know, the problem with handcuffs is that they sometimes don't seem to work
translation.es: El problema con las esposas es que a veces no funcionan

translation.en: especially on someone who knows actual magic!
translation.es: con una persona que hace magia.

translation.en: [Terry] He did it!
Thank you very much.
Gentlemen, I would love to stick around all day and do my whole act,
translation.es: Me encantaría quedarme y hacer todo el número,

translation.en: but I have to get going. I have a children's show today
translation.es: pero debo irme. Tengo un evento infantil

translation.en: and I have to Scotchgard my rabbit.
So if I'm free to go…
Uh, gentlemen, I bid you farewell.
Hey, sorry, it's down the hall
through the double doors and then to the right or left?
translation.es: y luego a la derecha o a la izquierda?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, through the-- and to the-- to your right, yes.
translation.es: Sí, sí, es al final… y luego a tu derecha.

translation.en: -Right, okay. -Okay.
[Terry] We had one more suspect, and to get to her,
translation.es: Había una última sospechosa, y para abordarla,

translation.en: Conan was going to have to make a house call.
translation.es: Conan tenía que hacer una visita a domicilio.

translation.en: Alright, this is the home of Kathy Johanson.
translation.es: Bien, esta es la casa de Kathy Johanson.

translation.en: She's the leader of the local chapter of Mothers Against Magic Association.
translation.es: Lidera la sección local del MAMA, la Asociación de Madres contra la Magia.

translation.en: They believe that magic can lead to the occult,
translation.es: Creen que la magia puede derivar en prácticas ocultistas,

translation.en: devil worship, and S-E-X.
Sex.
You knew what I meant when I said--?
-Yeah. I spelled it out. -I see.
So what I need you to do is, I need to get in there and infiltrate and see if she is capable of murder.
translation.es: Voy a necesitar que entres, te infiltres y veas si es capaz de asesinar a alguien.

translation.en: And you're going to use this earpiece,
where I got an earpiece in and you're going to use this ear piece.
translation.es: Tengo este auricular y tú te lo vas a poner.

translation.en: And I'm going to put that in and I--
You're gonna put it in and you're just going to listen to what I got to tell you.
translation.es: Te lo pones, escuchas todo lo que te voy diciendo.

translation.en: And just do exactly as I say. Okay.
translation.es: - Y haces exactamente lo que te diga. - Bien.

translation.en: But we need a code word. Obviously.
If things go south.
If things go south, we're going to need a code word.
translation.es: Si se complica, decimos el código.

translation.en: I got it.
Tittynope.
Tittynope.
Yeah, you know what "Tittynope" means? No, I don't.
It's like a small gathering of like leftovers.
Like a crumbs or whatever on a plate.
translation.es: Los restos que quedan en el plato.

translation.en: -Oh, a little tittynope. -Yeah, it's a little tittynope.
This is a great ride, by the way. Thank you.
Yeah, is it a car or a party favor?
translation.es: ¿Es un coche de verdad o un autito de juguete?

translation.en: Oh, you're kidding.
I should go.
[Terry] Alright, Conan. I want you to approach the door and knock.
translation.es: Conan, quiero que te acerques y llames a la puerta.

translation.en: Hello, there, lovely woman.
Well, hello there, lovely woman.
I'm sorry, but this is a private event for mothers only.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero este es un evento privado exclusivo para madres.

translation.en: Yeah, but I just moved to town.
translation.es: Es que me acabo de mudar…

translation.en: Yeah, you see, I just moved to town.
translation.es: Es que me acabo de mudar.

translation.en: And I really hate magic.
And I hate magic.
Can I get some kind of a day pass?
And I thought maybe I could get a day pass. Is that cool?
translation.es: Tal vez podrían darme un pase diario. ¿Estaría bien?

translation.en: What's your name?
It's Todd.
-It's Todd. -Todd, Todd what?
translation.es: - Me llamo Todd. - Todd. ¿Y tu apellido?

translation.en: My name is Todd Caring.
-Ton. -Berg.
Caringtonberg. My name--
I'm sorry, Todd Caringtonbergson, and--
Where are you from, Todd Caringtonbergensonfield?
Just pick a state that nobody lives in.
translation.es: Un estado en el que no viva nadie.

translation.en: I'm from Idaho.
I grew up in Idaho.
You're doing great, partner. Really great.
translation.es: Vas muy bien, compañero. Muy bien.

translation.en: But listen, you're on your own for a few minutes.
translation.es: Mira, te dejo solo unos minutos.

translation.en: There's something really important I need to do.
I'm sure that you heard what happened to my son, Jimothy.
translation.es: Habrás oído hablar de lo que le pasó a mi hijo, Jimothy.

translation.en: One day he was practicing coin tricks in front of the mirror.
translation.es: Un día, estaba haciendo trucos en casa

translation.en: The next, he's God knows where,
doing street magic and playing Hide the Honker.
translation.es: haciendo magia en la calle, quién sabe dónde.

translation.en: Yes, so--
You'd think these magicians
would take responsibility for their actions, but they don't care.
translation.es: se hacen responsables de sus actos, pero no les importa.

translation.en: I've been begging Captivating Keith for years to think of the children.
translation.es: Llevo años rogando a Keith el Encantador que piense en los niños.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Begged him.
And if that poor assistant of his, if her murder
translation.es: Y si el asesinato de esa pobre asistente suya

translation.en: saves even one child from a life of magic,
translation.es: puede salvar a un solo niño aunque sea,

translation.en: it would have been worth it.
-Can I make you a snack? -Yes.
-Yes, that's fine. -Okay.
Let me get you a bowl of Helen's famous chili!
translation.es: Te serviré un bol del famoso chile con carne de Helen.

translation.en: Thank you, Helen.
Yeah, I can already believe--
Here, you're gonna want some of this on it
translation.es: Mira, vamos a ponerle un poco de esto

translation.en: because, to be honest,
that cat food has more taste than this chili.
translation.es: esa comida para gatos tiene más sabor que este chile.

translation.en: So let me get this straight. You're angry and you're happy.
translation.es: Entonces, a ver si me queda claro. Estás enojada y estás contenta.

translation.en: I wouldn't say happy, it's a death. But
translation.es: Contenta no. Murió una persona, pero…

translation.en: if you think about the power of death and life after.
translation.es: si piensas en el poder de la muerte y el más allá…

translation.en: -How's that? -It's so good.
-Yes? -It's so good.
Oh, my goodness.
[Kathy] I've got to get this meeting started!
Okay, let's sit you down right over here. Todd.
Oh. Oh, yes. Right here? Sure.
Thank you so much. Let's get started, ladies.
translation.es: Muchísimas gracias. Vamos a empezar, chicas.

translation.en: Why don't we gather around?
Okay, now before we get started,
I'd like to introduce a very special guest.
translation.es: les presento a un invitado muy especial.

translation.en: Todd, go ahead and stand up. Don't be shy.
translation.es: Todd, ponte de pie, por favor. No seas tímido.

translation.en: -[ladies applauding] -Todd, ladies, this is Todd.
New members always give a testimonial
translation.es: Los nuevos miembros siempre dan su testimonio,

translation.en: and I'd like you to stand here and tell this group of God-fearing women
translation.es: así que te pido que les cuentes a estas mujeres temerosas de Dios

translation.en: the moment that you realized magic
translation.es: el momento en que comprendiste que la magia

translation.en: is the devil's tool.
Well, I'll tell you all it was an incredible experience that I had.
translation.es: Bueno, les voy a contar que tuve una experiencia increíble.

translation.en: -[sad music] -I was a child
and I wanted to be a magician.
So I practiced and practiced
and became quite the magician, a very good magician.
translation.es: y me convertí en mago, un mago bastante bueno.

translation.en: And one day I went down to the school yard, and I said,
translation.es: Un día, bajé al patio de la escuela y dije:

translation.en: "Check this out" and I fanned out my deck,
translation.es: "Miren esto". Abrí mi baraja de naipes en abanico

translation.en: and before I could do anything else,
translation.es: y, antes de que pudiera hacer nada,

translation.en: they beat me.
They beat me for 40 minutes,
then they stopped,
and they went and got ice cream,
came back and continued beating me.
And what happened to the boys who beat you up?
translation.es: ¿Qué les pasó a los que te golpearon?

translation.en: Well, they all became senators. Every single one of them.
translation.es: Se convirtieron en senadores, todos y cada uno de ellos.

translation.en: Name one.
Was the head bully.
Beat me savagely.
It doesn't make any sense.
I'm starting to wonder if your name is even Todd Caringtonbergenson.
translation.es: Me pregunto si de verdad te llamas Todd Caringtonbergenson.

translation.en: Oh, please.
Todd, what is the state fish of Idaho?
translation.es: Todd, ¿cuál es el pez típico de Idaho?

translation.en: It is a…
white-bellied cod.
[Kathy] Wrong!
It's the cutthroat trout.
Well, who knows the state fish?
This person is an imposter, ladies,
translation.es: Este hombre es un impostor, chicas,

translation.en: and he's using the art of illusion
translation.es: y está usando el arte del ilusionismo

translation.en: to get us to have S-E-X.
translation.es: para que tengamos S-E-X-O con él.

translation.en: No!
Get him! Mama! Mama!
-Mama! Mama! Mama! -Tittynope! Tittynope!
[male voice] …just appeared then.
Now, we have to do French drop which is a ball transfer,
translation.es: Ahora hacemos el torniquete, que es un cambio de manos,

translation.en: reach forward again, and again you say,
translation.es: nos acercamos otra vez y decimos:

translation.en: "Oh, is that another quarter in your ear?"
[women] Mama! Mama! Mama!
-[Conan] Tittynope. Tittynope. -Conan, what's going on? What's going on?
-Tittynope! Tittynope! -Mama! Mama!
Alright, lock yourself in a safe room, Conan.
translation.es: Enciérrate en un cuarto seguro, Conan.

translation.en: I'm coming to save you.
-Tittynope! -Mama! Mama! Mama!
It's locked. We can wait him out, though.
translation.es: Está trabada, pero podemos esperarlo afuera.

translation.en: Ladies! There's a guy in the corner asking kids to pick a card.
translation.es: ¡Señoras! Hay un tipo pidiendo a los niños que escojan un naipe.

translation.en: Any card!
Conan! It's senior detective, Terry Seattle. You can come out now.
translation.es: ¡Conan! Soy el detective Terry Seattle. Ya puedes salir.

translation.en: You're safe.
-You're safe. Are you okay? -I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm good.
translation.es: - ¿Estás bien? - Sí, estoy bien, no pasó nada.

translation.en: All right, let's get the hell out of--
Wow. Look at all these snacks.
Let's grab some stuff, come on.
They got plain tortillas. I can never find plain tortillas.
translation.es: Hay tortillas normales. Nunca encuentro de estas.

translation.en: Well, they're pretty available.
No, but every time I go to the grocery store, I'm like, "Do you have any plain tortillas?" they're like, "No, we're fresh out."
translation.es: Cada vez que voy a la tienda, me dicen que no tienen.

translation.en: They're very available.
Everyone has plain tortillas.
translation.es: Venden tortillas normales en todas partes.

translation.en: [Terry] It was time for Conan to decide
translation.es: Era hora de que Conan determinara

translation.en: who killed poor Sarah,
so we lured the three suspects back to the library
translation.es: así que invitamos a los sospechosos a la biblioteca

translation.en: under the guise of another magic show.
translation.es: con la excusa de otro espectáculo de magia. LA ACUSACIÓN

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, we will not be performing any illusions tonight.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, hoy no habrá ningún número de ilusionismo.

translation.en: No, in fact, if anything, we will be removing an illusion.
translation.es: No. En todo caso, vamos a desvelar una ilusión.

translation.en: The illusion
of innocence.
[Terry] That's right.
Before us here are these three top hats.
translation.es: Delante de nosotros están estos tres sombreros de copa.

translation.en: In each one is the name of a suspect.
translation.es: Cada uno tiene el nombre de un sospechoso.

translation.en: My partner, Conan O'Brien,
will now reveal who he believes committed this murder.
translation.es: nos dirá quién cree que cometió este asesinato.

translation.en: Conan, was it Deb,
was it Magic Melvin,
or was it Kathy?
please choose who you think is the killer.
translation.es: por favor, dinos quién es el asesino.

translation.en: The murderer…!
Magic Melvin.
[Rhonda] What is going on here?
Chief, we figured out who the killer is.
translation.es: Jefa, descubrimos quién es el asesino.

translation.en: Conan figured it out.
I have all the logic as to why it has to be Magic Melvin.
translation.es: Tengo todo el razonamiento detrás de mi acusación a Melvin el Mágico.

translation.en: I'm not sure exactly why I dressed as a magician,
translation.es: No sé muy bien por qué estoy vestido de mago,

translation.en: but I am certain
translation.es: pero lo que sí tengo claro

translation.en: he is the murderer.
translation.es: es que él es el asesino.

translation.en: And what is your evidence?
Magic Melvin,
you told us that you had to go Scotchgard your rabbit.
translation.es: nos dijiste que debías ir a limpiar a tu conejo.

translation.en: Maybe to keep hot sauce off the rabbit,
translation.es: Tal vez para quitarle la salsa picante,

translation.en: because who leaves hot sauce on a saw and no fingerprints?
translation.es: porque ¿quién deja salsa en una sierra, pero no huellas?

translation.en: Why, sir, that is the act
translation.es: Permíteme decir que eso es obra

translation.en: of a magician.
I also think you had another motive.
I think that Kathy is your mother.
translation.es: Creo que Kathy es tu madre.

translation.en: That you hate your mother
and that because she's turned her back on magic,
translation.es: y ella está en contra de la magia,

translation.en: you wanted to frame her.
That part's pretty far-fetched.
I'm the youngest person in this room.
translation.es: Soy la más joven de todos nosotros.

translation.en: I understand.
And I don't know how the whole age thing works.
translation.es: Todavía no me cuadra el tema de la edad.

translation.en: I'm still working on that.
It's very possible I could be your father.
translation.es: De hecho, podría ser tu padre.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Age-wise.
it brings me no joy to tell you that you are…
translation.es: con gran pesar debo decirle que está usted…

translation.en: Correct.
Yes!
Yes!
[Rhonda] It was Magic Melvin who killed the magician's assistant.
translation.es: Fue Melvin el Mágico quien mató a la asistente del mago.

translation.en: You did notice that Melvin put hot sauce on his breakfast burrito every morning.
translation.es: Seguro notó que Melvin ponía salsa picante en su burrito cada mañana.

translation.en: Three eggs soft scrambled, onions, peppers, Tabasco--
translation.es: Tres huevos revueltos, cebolla, pimiento, tabasco…

translation.en: And owned a rabbit for his act.
translation.es: Y que tenía un conejo para su espectáculo.

translation.en: I have to Scotchgard my rabbit.
translation.es: Tengo que limpiar a mi conejo.

translation.en: We know it couldn't have been Deb. She was allergic to pets.
translation.es: Sabíamos que no podía ser Deb. Es alérgica a las mascotas.

translation.en: My boyfriend tried to cheer me up by buying me a puppy, but I have allergies!
translation.es: Mi novio trató de animarme con un cachorrito, pero soy alérgica.

translation.en: Meanwhile Kathy had more motive than anyone,
translation.es: Por su parte, Kathy tenía más razones que nadie,

translation.en: but she didn't know how to pick the lock on the door
translation.es: pero no supo destrabar la puerta

translation.en: when you ran like an overgrown gazelle for safety.
translation.es: cuando usted corrió a encerrarse como una gacela en peligro.

translation.en: It's locked.
But you know who could pick a lock? Magic Melvin.
translation.es: ¿Quién podía forzar una cerradura? Melvin el Mágico.

translation.en: Especially on someone who knows actual--
translation.es: Sobre todo si la persona hace magia…

translation.en: -He did it! -[Melvin] Thank you very much.
Magic Melvin was the killer.
translation.es: Melvin el Mágico es el asesino.

translation.en: Take him away.
I only murdered her 'cause I wanted her dead!
translation.es: ¡Solo la asesiné porque la quería muerta!

translation.en: It's a very-- It's a good reason to murder somebody.
translation.es: Es una muy buena razón para matar a alguien.

translation.en: The handcuffs are not going to work on him.
Already, no handcuffs.
[Rhonda] Conan O'Brien, congratulations.
Well, Conan, you did it.
You solved the case, even though your logic was…
translation.es: Resolviste el caso, aunque tu lógica fue…

translation.en: crazy nonsensical.
But you make a fantastic cop.
You know, I also learned something.
I learned a little magic trick.
You learned magic.
That's right. Go ahead and sneeze.
translation.es: Así es. Hazme el favor de estornudar.

translation.en: Here.
Let me get you a handkerchief.
Go ahead.
I've got a handkerchief.
It's not ending. It's not ending.
This is legitimately not ending.
-It's a lot of-- -I'm getting--
Okay, you know what? Now, I just hate magic. This is stupid.
translation.es: Bueno, ahora detesto la magia. Esto es ridículo.

translation.en: [Terry] On the next episode of Murderville…
translation.es: En el próximo episodio de Murderville…

translation.en: [Rhonda] Terry say hi to your new partner, Marshawn Lynch.
translation.es: Saluda tu nuevo compañero, Marshawn Lynch.

translation.en: -How much training have you had? -I watched Training Day.
This was the murder weapon.
